name: Dodge' a Bullet
description:
CURRENT RUNNING HIGH SCORE: 62 - By Dark Peace

Check out their game - https://itch.io/jam/indie-tales-jam/rate/1117386

comment or message me your high score on the discord

Controls-

WASD or arrows to move

E to buy item

Description-

You play as a greedy old man who went inside an ancient ruin in search of treasure. Until he falls down a hole and ends up in this room which he cannot escape from! He tries his best to survive and grab some gold, and get some upgrades!
